nl.knaw.dans.rs.aggregator.syncore

Interface VerificationPolicy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultVerificationPolicy

    public interface VerificationPolicy
    Policies for verification of resources.

    The ResourceSync Specification is a framework. Depending on community-specific agreements, the hash, last modification date and size of a resource may or may not be given as attributes on an item. Depending on the specific implementation of the ResourceManager these attributes, if given, may or may not be verifiable. A VerificationPolicy should adjust for these Source community- and Destination-specific circumstances.

    • Method Detail

      • continueVerification

        boolean continueVerification(VerificationStatus stHash,
                             VerificationStatus stLastMod,
                             VerificationStatus stSize)
        Should successive verifications go on, given the status of verifications.
        Parameters:
        stHash - VerificationStatus of hash of resource
        stLastMod - VerificationStatus of last modified date of resource
        stSize - VerificationStatus of the size of the resource
        Returns:
        true if verification should continue, false otherwise

      • repeatDownload

        boolean repeatDownload(VerificationStatus stHash,
                       VerificationStatus stLastMod,
                       VerificationStatus stSize)
        Should we repeat the download of a resource, given the status of verifications.
        Parameters:
        stHash - VerificationStatus of hash of resource
        stLastMod - VerificationStatus of last modified date of resource
        stSize - VerificationStatus of the size of the resource
        Returns:
        true if download should be repeated, false otherwise

      • isVerified

        boolean isVerified(VerificationStatus stHash,
                   VerificationStatus stLastMod,
                   VerificationStatus stSize)
        Can the resource be marked as verified, given the status of verifications.
        Parameters:
        stHash - VerificationStatus of hash of resource
        stLastMod - VerificationStatus of last modified date of resource
        stSize - VerificationStatus of the size of the resource
        Returns:
